TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ControlSkinDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ControlSkinDelegate(control As Control) As Control
type ControlSkinDelegate = delegate of Control -> Control

param.name: control
param.span: 要向其应用主题外观的 。

span.span: The to which to apply the theme skin.

summary.span: 表示一种方法，该方法可将正确的控件外观应用于指定控件。

span.span: Represents the method that applies the correct control skin to the specified control.

returns.span: 传递给方法并应用了控件外观的 。

span.span: The that was passed to the method, with a control skin applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用网页和控件开发人员， ，或直接类。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. 这些类在内部由 ASP.NET 页面框架用于应用服务器端属性和 ASP.NET 主题和为特定类型的控件的控件外观文件中定义的级联样式表定义。These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server- side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls. 与关联委托方法的类。The delegate is associated with the method of the class. 由 ASP.NET 控件外观，它是 ASP.NET 主题的一个组件表示的类表示对象。The class represents an ASP.NET control skin, which is a component of an ASP.NET theme represented by a object. 有关 ASP.NET 主题的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information about ASP.NET themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
